args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- For all complex numbers z, |sinh z| ≤ (1/2) * e^{|z|}. -/
theorem sinh_le_exp_abs (z : Complex) : Complex.abs (Complex.sinh z) ≤ (1 / 2) * Real.exp (Complex.abs z) := by sorry

/-- For all complex numbers z, |cosh z| ≤ (1/2) * e^{|z|}. -/
theorem cosh_le_exp_abs (z : Complex) : Complex.abs (Complex.cosh z) ≤ (1 / 2) * Real.exp (Complex.abs z) := by sorry

args.query: Complex.abs norm complex mathlib4 Complex.abs deprecated use norm Complex.abs mathlib4 name

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- For all complex numbers z, |sinh z| ≤ (1/2) * e^{|z|}. -/
theorem sinh_le_exp_abs (z : Complex) : Complex.abs (Complex.sinh z) ≤ (1 : ℝ) / 2 * Real.exp (Complex.abs z) := by sorry

/-- For all complex numbers z, |cosh z| ≤ (1/2) * e^{|z|}. -/
theorem cosh_le_exp_abs (z : Complex) : Complex.abs (Complex.cosh z) ≤ (1 : ℝ) / 2 * Real.exp (Complex.abs z) := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- For all complex numbers z, |sinh z| ≤ (1/2) * e^{|z|} and |cosh z| ≤ (1/2) * e^{|z|}. -/
theorem sinh_cosh_le_exp_abs (z : Complex) :
  (Complex.abs (Complex.sinh z) ≤ (1 : ℝ) / 2 * Real.exp (Complex.abs z)) ∧
  (Complex.abs (Complex.cosh z) ≤ (1 : ℝ) / 2 * Real.exp (Complex.abs z)) := by sorry

```"}

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- For all complex numbers z, |sinh z| ≤ (1/2) * e^{|z|} and |cosh z| ≤ (1/2) * e^{|z|}. -/
axiom sinh_le_exp_abs (z : Complex) : Complex.abs (Complex.sinh z) ≤ (1 / 2 : ℝ) * Real.exp (Complex.abs z)

axiom cosh_le_exp_abs (z : Complex) : Complex.abs (Complex.cosh z) ≤ (1 / 2 : ℝ) * Real.exp (Complex.abs z)

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- For all complex numbers z, ∥sinh z∥ ≤ (1/2) * e^{∥z∥} and ∥cosh z∥ ≤ (1/2) * e^{∥z∥}. -/
axiom sinh_le_exp_norm (z : Complex) : Norm.norm (Complex.sinh z) ≤ (1 / 2 : ℝ) * Real.exp (Norm.norm z)

axiom cosh_le_exp_norm (z : Complex) : Norm.norm (Complex.cosh z) ≤ (1 / 2 : ℝ) * Real.exp (Norm.norm z)
